title: Delhi govt to audit DISCOMs on pension surcharge issue
description: Delhi Chief Minister Atishi has initiated a special audit of power companies to investigate the pension surcharge issue. Conducted by CAG-approved auditors, this audit aims to ensure transparency in the pension process of the Delhi Vidyut Board. The audit seeks to safeguard the pension benefits of over 20,000 DVB pensioners and ensure proper fund utilization for their welfare.
